Uses of Interface
net.jxta.content.ContentProvider

Packages that use ContentProvider
net.jxta.content Content objects are container objects that can hold arbitrary data and are associated with a JXTA ID (replacing the older Codat API). 
net.jxta.impl.content   
net.jxta.impl.content.defprovider Implementation of the ContentProviderSPI which uses a custom, lightweight, easy to implement, but relatively slow protocol to transfer Content. 
net.jxta.impl.content.srdisocket Implementation of the ContentProviderSPI which uses the JxtaSocket API to provide Content transfer capabilities. 
 

Uses of ContentProvider in net.jxta.content
 

Subinterfaces of ContentProvider in net.jxta.content
 interface ContentProviderSPI
          Service provider interface used to define new implementations of ContentProvider search and transfer mechanism.
 interface ContentService
          The ContentService is intended to be the end-user's main access point when working with Content and Content transfers.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content that return ContentProvider
 ContentProvider NullContentTransfer.getContentProvider()
          Get the provider which created and manages this transfer.
 ContentProvider ContentTransfer.getContentProvider()
          Get the provider which created and manages this transfer.
 ContentProvider ContentShare.getContentProvider()
          Get the provider which created and manages this share.
 ContentProvider ContentProviderEvent.getContentProvider()
          Get the ContentProvider which produced this event.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content that return types with arguments of type ContentProvider
 List<ContentProvider> ContentService.getActiveContentProviders()
          Returns a list of content service provider instances underlying this service which have been started and are available for use.
 List<ContentProvider> ContentService.getContentProviders()
          Returns a list of content service provider instances underlying this service.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content with parameters of type ContentProvider
 void ContentService.removeContentProvider(ContentProvider provider)
          Removes a provider instance.
